# Level 8 (ЛЕВЕЛ 8) — Digital Agency

> Bulgarian digital agency specializing in e-commerce, AI chatbots, automation, and loyalty programs.

## About

ЛЕВЕЛ 8 ЕООД is a technology agency based in Sofia, Bulgaria. We build custom digital solutions for businesses — from online stores and AI chatbots to process automation and loyalty programs.

- Website: https://level8.bg
- Email: info@level8.bg
- Phone: +359 895 552 550
- EIK: 207598505

## Services

- **E-commerce websites** — Custom Next.js and Shopify online stores with payment integration
- **AI Chatbots** — Intelligent customer service bots trained on your business data
- **Business automation** — Workflow automation, CRM integration, reporting dashboards
- **Loyalty programs** — Customer retention systems with points, rewards, and gamification

## Case Studies

- [Euphoria Beauty](https://level8.bg/projects/euphoria-beauty) — Beauty salon website with online bookings, +180% reservations
- [Vrachka.eu](https://level8.bg/projects/vrachka) — AI astrology platform, 2000+ active users
- [Bacho Iliya](https://level8.bg/projects/bacho-iliya) — Landing page for dairy products, 3x inquiries
- [Profiline GM25](https://level8.bg/projects/profiline) — Product site, Top 3 Google organic
- [Ivanovi-AM](https://level8.bg/projects/ivanovi-am) — Corporate site for Mitsubishi Electric dealer, +45% organic traffic
- [Your Moment](https://level8.bg/projects/your-moment) — Wedding photography portfolio, +60% inquiries
- [Exotic Flowers](https://level8.bg/projects/exotic-flowers) — Garden center with online catalog and ordering
